title: The liberals want to change the name "Cracker Barrel " to "Caucasian Barrel "?
subtitle: A change.org's request for a change called "Caucasian Barel" started and continues to be ironic.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Librals" wants to change the name of Kracker Barrel to "Caucasian Barrel" because otherwise he's racist.
